description:
Crazy jumps, dangerous races, stunts, competition with friends, it all stays and now there's more!!! Get back behind the wheel of the fastest and most difficult vehicles to control. Are you ready? You have a brand new car at your disposal - a real rocket, are you able to tame it?

FEATURES:
Brand new map, full of ramps, jumps, tunnels and much more!
Brand new car, this is a rocket, this is __
Completely redesigned leaderboards
New quests, new challenges, new secrets to discover

The question is - are you ready for this? Prove that you are a real stuntman!
name: Rekt: The Forge
